replies.message: Another guy who is a hater bc eminem is white 😂😂

Busta, Tech9 and the rest are faster but that because they only say half of a word. Lol if you didn't have subtitles you couldn't even it understand them. Eminem spit just as fast but actually pronounced every word fully and correctly. Hate if you want but looks who's in the record book and look who isn't.

Caleb Morgan you're an idiot!!! You can't understand Tech, because you only got half a brain cell left, there is no subtitle on the radio, iPod, CD player ect... I'm an Eminem fan as well, yours just an idiot... And now there is Alexander Lowe who agrees with you.. He's an idiots, idiot... Both of you guys are fucking idiots...

^ Well here's an opinion from someone who's not a "fucking idiot" Busta and Tech chop syllables, meaning they string syllables together and remove most of the words. So although they aren't cutting the words in half they're dropping parts of them in order to say them quicker. Besides it doesn't count as a word when you say "Chah!" every 5 seconds. "Dark and Wicked" "Chah" "Autistic kids" "chah" "pickin' up frogs and crickets" "chah" yeah way better and more creative than Em.
Justin, you just pointed out the obvious being that there's no subtitle on the radio, iPod, and on CD players, I think you're the idiot.
Envel shut up you tit
